get.description: Returns a list of teams that currently running on Samsahai.
get active promotions by team name
get.summary: get active promotions by team name

500.description: cannot get activepromotion/activepromotion histories of team {team}

get.description: get active promotion histories by team name
get.summary: get active promotion histories by team name

500.description: cannot get activepromotion histories of team {team}

get.description: get active promotion history by team and history name
get.summary: get active promotion history by team and history name

404.description: activepromotion history {history} of team {team} not found

500.description: cannot get activepromotion history {history} of team {team}

get.description: Returns zip log file of the active promotion history
get.summary: Get zip log of active promotion history

404.description: activepromotion history {history} of team {team} not found

500.description: cannot get activepromotion history {history} of team {team}

get.description: Returns list of components of team

400.description: There is no active namespace to destroy

get.description: Returns queue information of pull request deployment flow.
Return pull request queue history of team by id
get.summary: Get Team Pull Request Queue History

404.description: pull request queue history not found

get.description: Returns zip log file of the pull request queue history
get.summary: Get Team Pull Request Queue History Log

404.description: pull request queue history not found

post.description: Endpoint for manually triggering pull request deployment

get.description: Returns queue information of new component upgrading flow.
Return queue history of team by id
Returns zip log file of the queue history

post.description: Endpoint for manually triggering new component update

createdAt.description: TODO: store values file of all components

noOfRetry.description:
NoOfRetry represents how many times this active promotion process has been run
+optional

promotedBy.description:
PromotedBy represents a person who promoted the ActivePromotion
+optional

skipTestRunner.description:
SkipTestRunner represents a flag for skipping running pre-active test
+optional

tearDownDuration.description:
TearDownDuration represents duration before tear down the previous active namespace
+optional

activeComponents.description:
ActiveComponents represents a list of promoted active components
+optional

conditions.description:
Conditions contains observations of the resource's state e.g.,
Queue deployed, being tested
+optional
+patchMergeKey=type
+patchStrategy=merge

demotionStatus.description:
DemotionStatus represents a status of the active demotion
+optional

destroyedTime.description:
DestroyedTime represents time at which the previous active namespace will be destroyed
+optional

hasOutdatedComponent.description:
HasOutdatedComponent defines whether current active promotion has outdated component or not
+optional

isTimeout.description:
IsTimeout defines whether the active promotion has been timeout or not
+optional

message.description:
Message defines details about why the active promotion is in this condition
+optional

outdatedComponents.description:
OutdatedComponents represents map of outdated components
+optional

preActiveQueue.description:
PreActiveQueue represents a pre-active queue status
+optional

previousActiveNamespace.description:
PreviousActiveNamespace represents an active namespace before promoting
+optional

result.description:
Result represents a result of the active promotion
+optional

rollbackStatus.description:
RollbackStatus represents a status of the rollback process
+optional

startedAt.description:
StartedAt represents time at which the active promotion started
+optional

state.description:
ActivePromotionState represents a current state of the active promotion
+optional

updatedAt.description:
UpdatedAt represents time at which the active promotion finished
+optional

demotionTimeout.description:
DemotionTimeout defines maximum duration for doing active demotion
+optional

maxHistories.description:
MaxHistories defines maximum length of ActivePromotionHistory stored per team
+optional

maxRetry.description:
MaxRetry defines max retry counts of active promotion process in case failure
+optional

outdatedNotification.description:
OutdatedNotification defines a configuration of outdated notification
+optional

rollbackTimeout.description:
RollbackTimeout defines maximum duration for rolling back active promotion
+optional

tearDownDuration.description:
TearDownDuration defines duration before teardown the previous active namespace
+optional

timeout.description:
Timeout defines maximum duration for doing active promotion
+optional

componentCleanupTimeout.description:
ComponentCleanupTimeout defines timeout duration of component cleaning up
+optional

engine.description:
Engine defines method of deploying

mock - for test only, always return success

helm3 - deploy chart with helm3
+optional

timeout.description:
Timeout defines maximum duration for deploying environment
+optional

bundles.description: Bundles represents a bundle of pull request components configuration

concurrences.description:
Concurrences defines a parallel number of pull request queue
+optional

maxHistoryDays.description:
MaxHistoryDays defines maximum days of PullRequestQueueHistory stored
+optional

maxRetry.description:
MaxRetry defines max retry counts of pull request component upgrade
+optional

resources.description:
Resources represents how many resources of pull request namespace
+optional

tearDownDuration.description:
TearDownDuration defines duration before teardown the pull request components
+optional

trigger.description:
Trigger represents a pull request trigger configuration
+optional

activePromotion.description:
ActivePromotion represents configuration about active promotion
+optional

bundles.description:
Bundles represents a group of component for each bundle
+optional

components.description:
Components represents all components that are managed
+optional

envs.description:
Envs represents urls of values file per environments
ordering by less priority to high priority
+optional

priorityQueues.description:
PriorityQueues represents a list of bundles/components' name which needs to be prioritized
the first one has the highest priority and the last one has the lowest priority
+optional

pullRequest.description:
PullRequest represents configuration about pull request
+optional

maxHistoryDays.description:
MaxHistoryDays defines maximum days of QueueHistory stored
+optional

maxRetry.description:
MaxRetry defines max retry counts of component upgrade
+optional

pullRequestInferGitlabMRBranch.description:
PullRequestInferGitlabMRBranch is for Pull Request's testRunner on gitlab.
If true, samsahai will try to infer the testRunner branch name
from the gitlab MR associated with the PR flow [default: false].
+optional

failureComponents.description: FailureComponents defines a list of failure components

issueType.description: IssueType defines a deployment issue type

componentName.description: ComponentName defines a name of component

firstFailureContainerName.description: FirstFailureContainerName defines a first found failure container name

nodeName.description: NodeName defines the node name of pod

restartCount.description: RestartCount defines the number of times the container has been restarted

components.description: Components represents a list of pull request components which are deployed together as a bundle

dependencies.description:
Dependencies defines a list of components which are required to be deployed together with the main component
+optional

gitRepository.description:
GitRepository represents a string of git "<owner>/<repository>" e.g., agoda-com/samsahai
used for publishing commit status
+optional

maxRetry.description:
MaxRetry defines max retry counts of pull request component upgrade
+optional

name.description: Name defines a bundle component name, can be any name

resources.description:
Resources represents how many resources of pull request namespace
+optional

tearDownDuration.description:
TearDownDuration defines duration before teardown the pull request components
+optional

image.description:
Image defines an image repository, tag and pattern of pull request component which is a regex of tag
+optional

maxRetry.description:
MaxRetry defines max retry counts of pull request component upgrade
+optional

name.description: Name defines a main component name which is deployed per pull request

resources.description:
Resources represents how many resources of pull request namespace
+optional

source.description:
Source defines a source for image repository
+optional

tearDownDuration.description:
TearDownDuration defines duration before teardown the pull request components
+optional

bundleName.description: BundleName represents a pull request bundle name

components.description:
Components represents a list of components which are deployed
+optional

gitRepository.description: GitRepository represents a github repository of the pull request

isPrTriggerFailed.description:
IsPRTriggerFailed represents the result of pull request trigger
+optional

noOfOrder.description:
NoOfOrder defines the position in queue
lower is will be picked first

noOfRetry.description:
NoOfRetry defines how many times this pull request component has been tested
+optional

prNumber.description: PRNumber represents a pull request number

prTriggerCreatedAt.description:
PRTriggerCreatedAt represents time when pull request trigger has been start
+optional

prTriggerFinishedAt.description:
PRTriggerFinishedAt represents time when pull request trigger has been finish
+optional

teamName.description: TeamName represents team owner of the pull request queue

tearDownDuration.description:
TearDownDuration defines duration before teardown the pull request components
+optional

testRunner.description:
TestRunner represents configuration about how to test the environment. If defined, this will override
testRunner from config
+optional

upcomingCommitSHA.description:
UpcomingCommitSHA represents an upcoming commit SHA in case queue is running
+optional

upcomingComponents.description:
UpcomingComponents represents an upcoming components which are deployed in case queue is running
+optional

conditions.description:
Conditions contains observations of the resource's state e.g.,
Queue deployed, being tested
+optional
+patchMergeKey=type
+patchStrategy=merge

createdAt.description: CreatedAt represents time when the component has been added to queue

deploymentQueue.description:
ComponentUpgrade defines a deployed pull request queue
+optional

destroyedTime.description:
DestroyedTime represents time at which the PR namespace will be destroyed
+optional

pullRequestNamespace.description: PullRequestNamespace represents a current pull request namespace

result.description:
Result represents a result of the pull request queue
+optional

state.description: State represents current status of this queue

updatedAt.description: UpdatedAt represents time when the component was processed

criteria.description:
Criteria tells how does the duration apply, default is `failure`.
+optional

duration.description: Duration tells how much the staging controller will wait before destroying the pull request namespace

maxRetry.description:
MaxRetry defines max retry counts of pull request trigger if cannot find image in the registry
+optional

pollingTime.description:
PollingTime defines a waiting duration time to re-check the pull request image in the registry
+optional

version.description: Version represents Docker image tag version
Version represents Docker image tag version

bundle.description:
Bundle represents a bundle name of component
+optional

components.description:
Components represents a list of components which are deployed
+optional

name.description: Name represents a Component name or bundle name if exist

nextProcessAt.description: NextProcessAt represents time to wait for process this queue

noOfOrder.description:
NoOfOrder defines the position in queue
lower is will be picked first

noOfRetry.description:
NoOfRetry defines how many times this component has been tested
+optional

prNumber.description:
PRNumber represents a pull request number
+optional

skipTestRunner.description:
SkipTestRunner represents a flag for skipping running test
+optional

teamName.description: TeamName represents team owner of the queue

testRunner.description:
TestRunner represents configuration about how to test the environment
+optional

type.description: Type represents how we will process this queue

conditions.description:
Conditions contains observations of the resource's state e.g.,
Queue deployed, being tested
+optional
+patchMergeKey=type
+patchStrategy=merge

createdAt.description: CreatedAt represents time when the component has been added to queue

deployEngine.description: DeployEngine represents engine using during installation

deploymentIssues.description:
DeploymentIssues defines a list of deployment issue types
+optional

kubeZipLog.description: KubeZipLog defines log of k8s resources during deployment in base64 zip format

nextProcessAt.description: NextProcessAt represents time to wait for process this queue

noOfProcessed.description: NoOfProcessed represents how many time that this queue had been processed

queueHistoryName.description: QueueHistoryName defines name of history of this queue

startDeployTime.description: StartDeployTime represents the time when this queue start deploying

startTestingTime.description: StartTestingTime represents the time when this queue start testing

state.description: State represents current status of this queue

updatedAt.description: UpdatedAt represents time when the component was processed

baseURL.description:
BaseURL represents a github base url e.g., https://github.com
+optional

BaseURL represents a gitlab base url e.g., https://gitlab.com
+optional

updatedBy.description:
UpdatedBy represents a person who updated the StableComponent
+optional

version.description: Version represents Docker image tag version

endpoint.description: Endpoint represents the staging endpoint endpoint.

image.description: Image represents image for run staging controller.

isDeploy.description: IsDeploy represents flag to deploy staging controller or not.

desc.description:
Description represents description for this team
+optional

owners.description:
Owners represents contact point of this team
+optional

resources.description:
Resources represents how many resources per namespace for the team
+optional

stagingCtrl.description:
StagingCtrl represents configuration about the staging controller.
For easier for developing, debugging and testing purposes
+optional

activeComponents.description:
ActiveComponents represents a list of stable components in active namespace
+optional

activeDeletedBy.description:
ActiveDeletedBy represents a person who deleted the Active environment
+optional

activePromotedBy.description:
ActivePromotedBy represents a person who promoted the ActivePromotion
+optional

conditions.description:
Conditions contains observations of the resource's state e.g.,
Team namespace is created, destroyed
+optional
+patchMergeKey=type
+patchStrategy=merge

desiredComponentImageCreatedTime.description:
DesiredComponentImageCreatedTime represents mapping of desired component image and created time
map[componentName][repository:tag] = image and createdTime
+optional
+kubebuilder:pruning:PreserveUnknownFields

stableComponents.description:
StableComponentList represents a list of stable components
+optional

syncTemplate.description:
SyncTemplate represents whether the team has been synced to the template or not
+optional

templateUID.description:
TemplateUID represents the template update ID
+optional

pullRequest.description:
PullRequest represents connection strings of all pull request environments
+optional
